pkgmetadata.longdescription: # pdb4all![python](https://img.shields.io/badge/python-3.7+-red.svg)[![License: GPLv3](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-GPLv3-blue.svg)](https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0)*Convert between common protein pdb formats and names*### InstallationRequires `python 3.7+`. No additional dependencies are needed.*pdb4all* is frequently uploaded to [PyPI](https://pypi.org/project/pdb4all/). To install it, execute the following command:``` pip install pdb4all```### Usage``` pdb4all <options> .pdb```#### Currently supported ForceFields name conventions * Amber * Charmm * OPLS#### Currently supported formats (software) * Fasta * Maestro * GROMACS * fDynamo
